name: Wizard def
description:
My old game, which development dropped when my hard drive died and took with it source code. I enjoyed making this game, mostly cause of music and sounds. It had to have narrative, but now it is in my head only. Shortly - red guys are goblins corrupted by demons.

Click castle on map, then on image in book to start level. Levels are endless and pointless.

Use LMB and 1234 to control character
